A Note on Pricing
Because each pie is lovingly baked in my home kitchen, the costs are a bit higher than mass-produced alternatives. Every pie is about 24 cm in diameter and serves around 6 – 8 people… depending on how big their sweet tooth is.

title: Menu
text:
How it works
Every pie is handmade with love, crafted with care, and baked using only high-quality Swiss ingredients. Each pie is about 24 cm in diameter and serves 6–10 people — depending, of course, on how generous the slices are.
Orders can be picked up in Wallisellen, or delivery within the Zürich area may be arranged. Because every pie and dessert is made from scratch — from resting the dough to letting the filling set — please allow at least 4 days’ notice for your order.


Get in Touch or Place an Order

title: What I Do
text:
Flaky Pies
Cinnamon Apple Crumble Pie
Cozy spiced apples tucked under a buttery crumble.
Blueberry Maple Chess Pie
The taste of a maple syrup soaked pancake in a slice.
Chocolat-y Pecan Pie
The richness of dark chocolate with toasty pecans and a hint of salt.

title: What I Do
text:
Seasonal Pies
Pumpkin Pie
Creamy spiced pumpkin custard in a crisp, flaky shell — fall in a slice.

title: What I Do
text:
Treats & More
Sesame Rice Krispies Treats
Chewy, toasty-sweet bars with a nutty sesame twist.
Bell Pepper and Feta Cornbread
Savory-sweet cornbread topped with creamy peppers and tangy feta.
Costum Order
Whether it’s a personalized pie flavor, a batch of mini treats, or a dessert to match a special occasion, I’m always happy to create something just for you.
